title: Center of Gravity
description: It was supposed to be only one night. But one night can change your life forever. And even the most magical nights have consequences...MattI'm done with relationships. Now all I want is to win the Cup.But what if the new team owner turns my world upside down?Can Emilia convince me there’s more to this world than stickhandling?Two lost souls.A secret that changes their lives forever.An unexpected love story.Center of Gravity is the first book in this spirited sports romance series but can be read standalone. If you like surprise pregnancy romances, swoon-worthy characters, and triumphs over life challenges, then you’ll adore Isabella Cassazza’s story of unexpected connection.Buy Center of Gravity to dig your blades into ice-cold tension today!
author: Isabella Cassazza
